full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 217 of 228 893 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct 1 A. It looked like a huge man's penis with two heads. 2 Q. What did you do with the dildo? 3 A. The dildo, I use to put my gloves on, put them in the sink, run it under water, and put the dildo in Ms. Maxwell's closet in a basket. 4 5 6 Q. I want to be clear here. Where did you find the dildo after the massage? 7 8 A. Usually at the table, at the massage table or at his bed. 9 Q. And the massage table, where was that? 10 A. The massage table was -- it was left there in the room. It was in his -- in Mr. Epstein's bathroom. 11 12 Q. If that's where you found it, why would you put it in Ms. Maxwell's bathroom? 13 14 A. That's the place what I was told -- it was kept all the time. 15 16 Q. How do you know that? 17 A. Because I knew everything that happen in that house. 18 Q. Can you describe the basket in Ms. Maxwell's bathroom where you put the dildo after Mr. Epstein's massages? 19 20 A. Yes. It was like a wicker basket, the size of a garbage can, pretty large, and it had a cover on it. 21 22 Q. What else do you remember seeing in that basket? 23 24 A. I saw pornographic tapes, tapes, and I saw a custom, a black vinyl or leather black, I remember it was black, custom. 25 Q. Do you mean costume? 26 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018090
